virgile_p.name: Virgile P., Barber
virgile_p.comment: Excellent experience with Mathieu. The website he created is both aesthetic and functional. The custom booking section was thought out down to the smallest detail and greatly facilitates managing my clients. Professional, responsive, and attentive. I highly recommend!

ibrahim_b.name: Ibrahim B., UX/UI Designer
ibrahim_b.comment: I worked with Mathieu for over 3 years at Extia, on the Vamos team, where he worked as a React front-end developer on our internal CRM. He's someone who's highly involved, serious about his work, always open to feedback, and with a real desire to improve. He always took feedback constructively, and it showed in the quality of his work. Besides being a good developer, he's also a really nice person, always willing to lend a hand and bring good vibes to the team. In short, a real pleasure to work with. I recommend him without hesitation!
